ID.description: Globally unique identifier of the event (UUID version 4 as specified in RFC 4122).

EventType.description: Type of the event. Controlled vocabulary: 'RelationshipCreated' or 'RelationshipDeleted'

Time.description: Time when the payload information was created.

Creator.description: Name of the party, which emmited this event.

Source.description: Name of the source, algorithm or procedure, which created this event.

Payload.description: Payload information specific to the EventType. An array, containing one or more payloads of the structure matching with the EventType.
